inclusion.criterion: diagnosed as having cirrhosis of liver
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of cirrhosis of liver based on clinical, biochemical, and ultrasonographical or liver histological data
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: clinical, biochemical, and ultrasonographical or liver histological data

exclusion.criterion: alcohol intake during the past 6 weeks
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: previous transjugular intrahepatic portosystemic shunt or shunt surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: significant comorbid illness such as heart, respiratory, or renal failure
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: lab studies showed: Creatinine: 0.9 mg/dL with eGFR >60 mL/min

exclusion.criterion: any neurologic diseases such as Alzheimer's disease, Parkinson's disease, and nonhepatic metabolic encephalopathies.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients on psychoactive drugs, such as antidepressants or sedatives
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The patient reports that he has been on insulin since the time of his diagnosis, and he has never been prescribed oral agents for diabetes management.

exclusion.criterion: those who restart alcohol consumption during follow-up will also be excluded.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 24-year-old man with type 1 diabetes, currently homeless and without insulin supply. He has had previous episodes of diabetic ketoacidosis.
